## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c33741bca6736c936d2c0540044a5d38caf6a18b6981e6268da4295f64985a68)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'selenium-matplotlib' @ 17.9.4 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
